panels.description: Memória heap utilizada

targets.expr:
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"}) * 100
/
sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"})

panels.title: HEAP USED

panels.description: Utilização de CPU
panels.title: CPU USAGE

panels.description: Memória não heap utilizada

targets.expr:
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"}) * 100
/
sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"})

panels.title: NON-HEAP USED

panels.description: Média de uso de CPU
panels.title: LOAD AVERAGE

panels.description: Número de requisições no último minuto
panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no último minuto

targets.expr:
rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])
/
rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])

panels.title: RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Número de erros 500 no último minuto
panels.title: ERROR 500

panels.description: Taxa de erros nos últimos 5 minutos

targets.expr:
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*", status="500"}[5m]))
/
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*", status="400"}[5m]))
/
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*", status="404"}[5m]))
/
sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[5m]))

panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Número de requisiçòes por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Percentil de latência por minuto
panels.title: LATENCY QUANTILE

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr:
rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])
/
rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m])
